metadata.Title: CVE-2023-30086 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Libtiff V.4.0.7 allows a localattacker to cause a denial of service via the tiffcp function in tiffcp.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-30086` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiff-tools - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiff6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiffxx6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0-5ubuntu1').
